The Guanban Wusu Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region of China

operators: Inner Mongolia Zhungeerqi Tehong Coal Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Inner Mongolia Zhungeerqi Tehong Coal Company, which is a subsidiary of Jizhong Energy Group.
